      • buildTree

        public static TreeNode buildTree(TreeNode[] nodes)
        Builds a Huffman-tree from orphan nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodes - array of lone TreeNodes
        Returns:
        A Huffman-tree where leaves are sorted by count.

      • buildNodes

        public static TreeNode[] buildNodes(int[] freqs)
        Builds TreeNodes from a frequency list.
        Parameters:
        freqs - count of occurences for each byte
        Returns:
        an array of TreeNodes

      • buildLookupTable

        public static Codeword[] buildLookupTable(TreeNode treeRoot)
        Builds a lookup-table for Huffman codes.
        Parameters:
        treeRoot - root of a Huffman-tree
        Returns:
        array where arr[byte + 128] is the short code for that byte

      • decode

        public static byte[] decode(byte[] bytes,
                            TreeNode treeRoot)
        Decodes an array of bytes with a Huffman-tree into the originals. Expects bytes[0] to be in range 0-7 and to indicate the leftover bits in last byte.
        Parameters:
        bytes - Huffman-encoded bytes
        treeRoot - Huffmantree with codewords used for encoding
        Returns:
        Original file contents as array of bytes

      • encodeData

        public static byte[] encodeData(byte[] bytes,
                                Codeword[] lookup)
